summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and amending Plat 36E, page 24-323 of the Seattle Municipal Code (page 103 of the Official Zoning Map of The City of Seattle Ordinance 86300), to rezone certain property located at 1715 East Olive Way between Boylston Avenue and Harvard Avenue from Multiple Residence Highest Density Variable Height (RMV 150) Zone to Community Business (BC) Zone and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith (Petition of Jack A. Benaroya Company; C. F. 290370).
